author: Matthew Doran And Anna Henderson
title: China accuses Peter Dutton of parroting 'pitiful' US propaganda
description: The Chinese embassy in Canberra accuses Peter Dutton of being a mouthpiece for the United States and describes politicians calling for scrutiny of China's handling of the coronavirus pandemic as "pitiful".
content:
Posted 
April 22, 2020 00:21:05
The Chinese embassy in Canberra has accused Home Affairs Minister Peter Dutton of being a mouthpiece for the United States, in a withering criticism describing calls by Australian politicians for greater scrutiny of China's h… [+4066 chars]
